meanings.sent2: The student answered the question acceptably.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed acceptably when asked to sing.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed acceptably in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The cake was decorated acceptably for the party.

meanings.definition: In a satisfactory or adequate manner.
meanings.sent2: The team performed acceptably in the match.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced acceptably at the talent show.
meanings.sent4: The stars aligned acceptably for the perfect photo.
meanings.sent5: The medicine worked acceptably to relieve the pain.
